00038 #ifndef PMEMOBJ_MUTEX_HPP
00039 #define PMEMOBJ_MUTEX_HPP
00040 
00041 #include "libpmemobj++/detail/pexceptions.hpp"
00042 #include "libpmemobj/thread.h"
00043 #include "libpmemobj/tx_base.h"
00044 
00045 namespace nvml
00046 {
00047 
00048 namespace obj
00049 {
00050 
00060 class mutex {
00061 public:
00063         typedef PMEMmutex *native_handle_type;
00064 
00068         mutex() noexcept = default;
00069 
00073         ~mutex() = default;
00074 
00086         void
00087         lock()
00088         {
00089                 PMEMobjpool *pop = pmemobj_pool_by_ptr(this);
00090                 if (int ret = pmemobj_mutex_lock(pop, &this->plock))
00091                         throw lock_error(ret, std::system_category(),
00092                                          "Failed to lock a mutex.");
00093         }
00094 
00109         bool
00110         try_lock()
00111         {
00112                 PMEMobjpool *pop = pmemobj_pool_by_ptr(this);
00113                 int ret = pmemobj_mutex_trylock(pop, &this->plock);
00114 
00115                 if (ret == 0)
00116                         return true;
00117                 else if (ret == EBUSY)
00118                         return false;
00119                 else
00120                         throw lock_error(ret, std::system_category(),
00121                                          "Failed to lock a mutex.");
00122         }
00123 
00135         void
00136         unlock()
00137         {
00138                 PMEMobjpool *pop = pmemobj_pool_by_ptr(this);
00139                 if (int ret = pmemobj_mutex_unlock(pop, &this->plock))
00140                         throw lock_error(ret, std::system_category(),
00141                                          "Failed to unlock a mutex.");
00142         }
00143 
00149         native_handle_type
00150         native_handle() noexcept
00151         {
00152                 return &this->plock;
00153         }
00154 
00160         enum pobj_tx_lock
00161         lock_type() const noexcept
00162         {
00163                 return TX_LOCK_MUTEX;
00164         }
00165 
00169         mutex &operator=(const mutex &) = delete;
00170 
00174         mutex(const mutex &) = delete;
00175 
00176 private:
00178         PMEMmutex plock;
00179 };
00180 
00181 } /* namespace obj */
00182 
00183 } /* namespace nvml */
00184 
00185 #endif /* PMEMOBJ_MUTEX_HPP */
